name: A game where you try to not get covid
name_original: A game where you try to not get covid
description: PLEASE READ!!! I made this game in 5 hours therefore i didn't have time to make a tutorial. You move with the arrow keys and try to not get hit by the green persons. There's some vaccine guns spawning randomly and when have one you can shoot the green persons to cure them. You aim and shoot with the mouse. Enjoy!
